mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CouponConfigEntity ( id,coupon_config_id,product_uid,coupon_type,coupon_money,coupon_all_categories, coupon_count,coupon_valid_date,coupon_image,coupon_name,coupon_receive_valid_date, coupon_total_money,coupon_customer_limit,coupon_customer_amount_limit,coupon_issued_count, coupon_deadline,coupon_desc, remarks,create_time ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{couponConfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{productUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{couponAllCategories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{couponValidDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{couponImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{couponReceiveValidDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{couponTotalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponCustomerLimit,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{couponCustomerAmountLimit,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{couponIssuedCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{couponDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
